\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}

\usepackage[psfixbb,graphics,tightpage,active]{preview}
\PreviewEnvironment{tikzpicture}
\usepackage[margin=0in]{geometry}
\begin{document}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](1-2)at(-1.5,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{(1, 2)}};

\node[](2-3)at(1.5,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{(2, 3)}};

\node[](1-3)at(0,3.0)
{\scalebox{1}{(1, 3)}};

\draw(1-2.north)--(1-3.south);
\draw(2-3.north)--(1-3.south);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
